title: Synergistic cobalt oxide/reduced graphene oxide/biochar nano-composite catalyst: harnessing the power of the catalyst for sustainable remediation of organic dyes and chromium(VI)
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10089-10103
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01031K, Paper
Open Access

Amrita Priyadarsini, Chirasmayee Mohanty, Spandan Nanda, Abinash Mishra, Nigamananda Das, Nandita Swain, Manasi Dash, Pradip Kumar Jena
The first-ever report on the use of a Co3O4/reduced graphene oxide/biochar composite as an inexpensive, easily separable, and highly reactive visible light active photocatalyst.
